topic.title: STOP SMOKING SETTING QUIT DATE TOTAL (FREE PRESCRIPTION)
topic.shortdesc: STOP SMOKING SETTING QUIT DATE TOTAL (FREE PRESCRIPTION) is the number of PERSONS in the REPORTING PERIOD with:a Person Stop Smoking Episode andan Intended Smoking Quit Date anda FREE PRESCRIPTIONS INDICATOR of National Code 'Yes - PERSON is eligible for freePRESCRIPTIONS'.
